snippet.title: Crescent Loom Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Liked the cell stage of Spore, but wanted more depth? Gotten merrily lost in the graphical programming puzzles of SpaceChem? Love the "can I manage to build this...?" creativity of Kerbal Space Program? 

Crescent Loom is the very first biologically-realistic nervous system simulation game. Build underwater creatures and bring them to life by weaving senses and muscles together with the unique language of neuroscience.

More information & online demo:
http://www.crescentloom.com

Music:
"Scheming Weasel (faster version)" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
